title: Sia continues covering her face at post-Oscars party | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 121 shares But it was on top that the 'Cheap Thrills' hitmaker really made a statement, wearing a brown and blonde wig that covered her face. Known for hiding her identity, she added a cream coloured wide bream hat on top. Covering up! The 'Cheap Thrills' hitmaker made a bold statement with a brown and blonde wig Standing out: The 41-year-old opted for a vibrant citrus coloured suit, paired with a nude shirt Bright: A cream coloured wide bream hat on top of the wig finished off her eccentric outfit After a relatively successful indie pop career in Australia, the singer broke worldwide charts with her 'Titanium' collaboration with DJ David Guetta. Becoming uncomfortable with her newfound level of fame, Sia was open about her wish to keep her life private. And so it was that she began covering her face in public, at events and even during her on-stage performances. Big break: After a successful indie pop career, the singer broke worldwide charts with her hit 'Titanium' which she made with DJ David Guetta Low key: Becoming uncomfortable with her newfound level of fame, Sia was open about her wish to keep her life private Everywhere: Even on-stage the singer wears her wigs in an effort to maintain her privacy In 2015 during an interview on Sunrise, Sia told just why she likes to cover her face. 'You feel like prey and they’re the predator and you’re being hunted ... You go into fight or flight,' she said. 'It’s just like wanting to have a regular life just like a regular person and still be able to make music and sing ... but without having to sacrifice just having a regular life, that’s all.'
